properties.name: Athens, Greece
properties.description: Posted by Tylercathens Athens is the capital of Greece and is also its largest city.It is an acient city whose history goes back at least 3,000 years.Classical Athens is a center for the arts and philosophy.Many important philosophers such as Plato,Aristotle, Socrates,Pericles,and Sophocles were born here. Athens is known as the Cradle of Western Civilization and it is the birthplace of democrocy. At Athens you can see acient monuments and works of art from the Classical Era,such as the Parthenon and the Acropolis.The Olympics were first held at Athens in 1896 and since then the Olympics has thrived in other parts of the world. Athens has a lot of history.

properties.name: Budapest, Hungary
properties.description: Posted by TylercbudapestBudapest is the capital city of Hungary.It is the center for politics,culture,industry,and transportation for the country. Budapest is considered one of the most beautiful cities in the world. It is an important Central European source for buisness,culture,and tourism. Budapest is one of the top tourist destinations in Europe attracting over 20 million visitors a year.It is home to the Great Market Hall, which is a huge and eleborate indoor market and a major tourist destination. It also has many other tourist destinations included within the city such as the Hungarian State Opera House,the Buda Castle,and Fishermen\'s Bastion.

properties.name: Hong Kong, China
properties.description: Posted by TylercHong Kong, ChinaHong Kong first began as a trading port in the 19th century and has since then grown to a leading financial center.Hong Kong believes in a highly capitalist econonmy built on the policies of free market, low taxation,and government non-intervention.It is the wealthiest urban center in the People\'s Republic of China. Hong Kong\'s official languages are Cantonese and English.Several Hollywood movie stars such as Bruce Lee,Chow Yun-Fat, and Jackie Chan were born in Hong Kong and are featured in martial arts movies.Hong Kong has the largest number of skyscrapers in the world,followed by New York City.

properties.name: London, England
properties.description: Posted by TylercLondon, UKLondon is the capital of England and the U.K. Since its beginning London has been the site of many important movements such as the Industrial Revolution,the Gothic Revival,and the English Renaissance.Because of these things London has become one of the most popular tourist destinations in the world. London is home to many important landmarks. Some of these are the Palace of Westminister (which is home to the famous clock tower known as Big Ben),the Tower of London,and is also home to the Royal Botanic Gardens.London is known as a major global city because of its influence in politics,education,entertainment, media,fashion,and the arts.

properties.name: Los Angeles, California
properties.description: Posted by TylercLos Angeles, CA Located in South California, Los Angeles (L.A.) is the largest city in California and the second largest in the U.S. L.A. has a population of 3.8 million people and is over 469 square miles large.It is one of the world\'s most popular centers of culture,technology,and international trade.L.A. leads the world in producing popular entertainment like movies,video games,and recorded music. L.A. is well known for having the famous Hollywood sign that you\'ve probably seen many times.This landmark shows up in movies and media all the time.In Hollywood hundreds of movies are made every year.L.A. is also home to the NBA basketball teams, the Lakers and the Clippers,the MLB baseball team, the Dodgers, and the NHL hockey team the Kings.

properties.name: Mexico City, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by TylercMexico City, MexicoMexico City is the capital city of Mexico.It is the country\'s most important center for economics,industry,and culture. It is located in the Valley of Mexico and was originally built by the Aztecs in 1325.Since then it has been rebuilt and named Mexico City. Probably the most recognizable icon of Mexico city is the golden Angel of Independence,ordered to me modeled by Emperor Maximillian of Mexico. A famous museum/theater is the Fine Arts Palace which is made of white marble.Mexico City has the fourth highest number of theaters in the world,but it is the leader for the amount of museums.

properties.name: Paris, France
properties.description: Posted by Tylercparis The capital of France,Paris has an estimated population of around two million people. Paris is one of the world\'s leading centers for business and culture.It has a major influence in politics,entertainment, education,media,fashion,and arts, making it one of the world\'s major global cities. Paris is the world\'s most popular tourist destination,drawing in 30 million visitors a year. Many tourists are attracted to their famous museums and monuments.The cities most prized museum is the Louvre,the worlds most vistited art musuem which sees over 8 million visitors a year. In this musuem you can see the original Mona Lisa painting.Paris\'s most famous monument is the Eifel Tower, which 6 million tourists come to see every year.

properties.name: Rome, Italy
properties.description: Posted by TylercRome, ItalyRome is the capital of Italy and is also its largest city. It is home to the Colloseum which was built around 70 AD.The Colloseum was the largest ampitheater ever built in the Roman Empire. It was capable of seating over 60,000 spectators and was used for gladitorial combat.Rome is also home to many other landmarks including the Roman Forum, the Domas Aurea, and the Pantheon. The official language of Rome was Latin, which evolved into Italian.Rome is known around the world to have a higher education. The first university built in Rome,the La Sapienza, is the second largest in the world.Rome is also home to the Ciecitta Studios, which is the largest film and television production facility in Europe. Rome also has an underground subway system called the Rome Metro that takes people all around the city. All of these things make Rome a global city.

properties.name: Title or search term
properties.description: Posted by TylercLos Angeles, CA

properties.name: Toronto, Canada
properties.description: Posted by TylercToroto, CanadaToronto is the largest city in Canada and is the capital of Ontario. It is Canada\'s economic capital and is one of the top financial cities in the world.Toronto is one of the worlds most diverse cities,with about 49 percent of the population being born outside of Canada. Toronto is home to many unique landmarks. One is the CN tower, which is the world\'s second tallest free-standing structure,and is 110 meters taller than Chicago\'s Sear\'s Tower.It is a center for tourism and an important telecommunication hub for Toronto. Toronto is second to New York in high-rises in North America,having over 2,000 buildings over 300 feet tall.

properties.name: Vienna, Austria
properties.description: Posted by TylercVienna, AustriaVienna is the capital of Austria.It is Austria\'s largest city and it is also it\'s center for culture, economics,and politics.The historical and heart of the city was once surrounded by a giant wall which was knocked down in 1857.A street around Vienna now takes the place of the wall.Buildings, monuments,and parks were built around the street such as the town hall,the University,and the Parliament. Vienna is famous for its great number of parks.In these parks you can find famous monuments.The Imperial Summer Palace contains an 18th century park and the world\'s oldest zoo, which dates back to 1752. All of these things make Vienna a very important city.
